name: Time to say goodbye
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Francesco Sartori
[00:01.00] 作词 : Lucio Quarantotto
[00:23.180]Quando sono solo
[00:25.260]sogno all'orizzonte
[00:27.380]e mancan le parole
[00:29.960]si lo so che non c'e luce
[00:32.490]in una stanza quando manca il sole
[00:36.770]se non ci sei tu con me, con me
[00:42.360]su le finestre
[00:45.240]mostra a tutti il mio cuore
[00:48.700]che hai acceso
[00:52.700]chiudi dentro me
[00:56.160]la luce che
[00:58.640]hai incontrato per strada
[01:06.180]Time to say goodbye (Con te partiro)
[01:13.830]paesi che non ho mai
[01:21.470]veduto e vissuto con te
[01:26.270]adesso si li vivro
[01:29.890]con te partiro
[01:36.520]su navi per mari
[01:41.350]che io lo so
[01:43.490]no no non esistono piu
[01:48.789]it's time to say goodbye (con te io li vivro)
[01:53.539]Quando sei lontana
[01:55.800]sogno all'orizzonte
[01:57.550]e mancan le parole
[02:00.840]e io si lo so
[02:02.200]che sei con me con me
[02:05.230]tu mia luna tu sei qui con me
[02:07.230]mia solo tu sei qui con me
[02:11.770]con me con me con me
[02:19.780]Time to say goodbye (Con te partiro)
[02:27.860]paesi che non ho mai
[02:34.630]veduto e vissuto con te
[02:39.620]adesso si li vivro
[02:43.490]con te partiro
[02:50.700]su navi per mari
[02:54.970]che io lo so
[02:57.480]no no non esistono piu
[03:02.550]con te io li vivro
[03:05.960]Con te partiro
[03:12.780]su navi per mari
[03:17.540]che io lo so
[03:19.980]no no non esistono piu
[03:25.290]con te io li vivro
[03:28.820]Con te partiro
[03:59.300]
[04:04.970]
[04:23.760]

name: How Long
lyric:
[00:11.43]I'll admit I was wrong
[00:13.55]What else can I say girl
[00:15.39]Can't you blame my head and not my heart
[00:18.44]
[00:20.07]I was drunk I was gone
[00:22.16]That don't make it right but
[00:23.99]Promise there were no feelings involved
[00:26.85]
[00:28.76]She said boy tell me honestly
[00:33.20]Was it real or just for show
[00:35.96]
[00:37.47]She said save your apologies
[00:42.20]Baby I just got to know
[00:45.26]How long has this been goin' on
[00:49.67]You've been creepin' round on me
[00:51.97]While you're calling me baby
[00:54.00]How long has this been goin' on
[00:58.39]You've been acting so shady
[01:00.71]I've been feeling it lately baby
[01:03.70]
[01:12.47]I'll admit it's my fault
[01:14.61]But you gotta believe me
[01:16.56]When I say it only happened once
[01:19.42]
[01:21.15]I try and I try but you'll never see that
[01:25.14]You're the only one I wanna love
[01:27.92]
[01:29.86]She said boy tell me honestly
[01:34.50]Was it real or just for show
[01:37.08]
[01:38.57]She said save your apologies
[01:43.33]Baby I just got to know
[01:46.39]How long has this been goin' on
[01:50.86]You've been creepin' round on me
[01:53.14]While you're calling me baby
[01:55.07]How long has this been goin' on
[01:59.50]You've been acting so shady
[02:02.02]I've been feeling it lately baby
[02:04.78]
[02:11.13]How long has this been goin' on baby
[02:13.68]
[02:16.48]You gonna go tell me now
[02:17.62]
[02:22.13]She said boy tell me honestly
[02:26.84]Was it real or just for show
[02:29.30]
[02:30.92]She said save your apologies
[02:35.67]Baby I just got to know
[02:38.68]How long has this been goin' on
[02:45.47]You've been creepin' round on me
[02:47.52]While you're calling me baby
[02:49.62]How long has this been goin' on
[02:54.01]You've been acting so shady
[02:56.21]I've been feeling it lately baby
[02:58.55]How long has this been goin' on
[03:02.75]You've been creepin' round on me
[03:04.74]
[03:05.68]How long has this been goin' on baby
[03:07.60]How long has this been goin' on
[03:11.49]You gonna go tell me now
[03:11.65]You've been acting so shady
[03:13.60]I've been feeling it lately baby

name: 牡丹江
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 杨瑞代
[00:01.00] 作词 : 方文山
[00:13.94]弯成一弯的桥梁 倒映在这湖面上
[00:20.67]你从那头瞧这看 月光下 一轮美满
[00:27.48]青石板的老街上 你我走过的地方
[00:34.30]那段斑驳的砖墙 如今到底啥模样
[00:41.17]到不了的都叫做远方
[00:47.93]回不去的名字叫家乡
[00:54.78]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我聆听感伤你声音悠扬
[01:01.54]风铃摇晃清脆响 江边的小村庄午睡般安祥
[01:08.37]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我脚步轻响走向你身旁
[01:15.18]思念的光透进窗 银白色的温暖洒在儿时的床
[01:23.97]
[01:42.55]弯成一弯的桥梁 倒映在这湖面上
[01:49.40]你从那头瞧这看 月光下 一轮美满
[01:56.22]青石板的老街上 你我走过的地方
[02:03.03]那段斑驳的砖墙 如今到底啥模样
[02:09.89]到不了的都叫做远方
[02:16.70]回不去的名字叫家乡
[02:23.47]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我聆听感伤你声音悠扬
[02:30.31]风铃摇晃清脆响 江边的小村庄午睡般安祥
[02:37.10]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我脚步轻响走向你身旁
[02:43.94]思念的光透进窗 银白色的温暖洒在儿时的床
[02:50.84]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我聆听感伤你声音悠扬
[02:57.59]风铃摇晃清脆响 江边的小村庄午睡般安祥
[03:04.38]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我脚步轻响走向你身旁
[03:11.24]思念的光透进窗 银白色的温暖洒在儿时的床
[03:18.14]牡丹江弯了几个弯小鱼儿甭上船咱们不稀罕
[03:24.97]捞月亮张网补星光给爷爷下酒喝一碗家乡
[03:31.75]牡丹江弯了几个弯小虾米甭靠岸咱们没空装
[03:38.58]捞月亮张网补星光给姥姥熬汤喝一碗家乡

[03:18.14]牡丹江弯了几个弯小鱼儿甭上船咱们不稀罕
[03:24.97]捞月亮张网补星光给爷爷下酒喝一碗家乡
[03:31.75]牡丹江弯了几个弯小虾米甭靠岸咱们没空装
[03:38.58]捞月亮张网补星光给姥姥熬汤喝一碗家乡

name: 牡丹江
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 杨瑞代
[00:01.00] 作词 : 方文山
[00:13.94]弯成一弯的桥梁 倒映在这湖面上
[00:20.67]你从那头瞧这看 月光下 一轮美满
[00:27.48]青石板的老街上 你我走过的地方
[00:34.30]那段斑驳的砖墙 如今到底啥模样
[00:41.17]到不了的都叫做远方
[00:47.93]回不去的名字叫家乡
[00:54.78]谁在门外唱那首牡丹江 我聆听感伤你声音悠扬
